articles.title: Angry Russell Martin tells Swansea City players it's 'sink or swim time' as two strikers on brink of exit - Wales Online
articles.description: The head coach spoke about his side's frustrating penalty shootout loss to Oxford United and gave an update on the club's transfer business
articles.content:
Russell Martin blew up with his Swansea City players following their penalty shootout loss to Oxford United in the Carabao Cup.
